author: natalia-korneeva
body: As decided at BTV@HLT meeting and inspired by https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/9863/ we replace binomial uncertainties by Clopper-Pearson ones in efficiency histograms. Clopper-Perason uncertainties provide better description in low efficiency cases.
title: Moving to Clopper-Pearson uncertainties in efficiency histograms
